'''''I Fear'd the Fury of My Wind''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player must defeat {{Enemy|Eye of the Storm|text=Eye of the Storm &mdash; Restless Pure Elemental}} in [[Erinnyes Forest]].

==Trivia==
* The name of this achievement and its description are from {{w|William Blake}}'s poem ''I fear'd the fury of my wind''.
